item.description:
July 14, 2008


HI!

I have had a bit of a hard time to reset this meet-up group after Fr. Carl left for his new assignment in New Jersey. I hope I was able to settle all the technicalities. Let me know if you receive this message.

As as summary:

At our last meeting, we decided to take a break for the summer and to reconvene on September 21st, 4:00PM at:

Peace Abbey
Two North Main Street
Sherborn, MA 01770
508-429-2144

Moreover we had chosen two books (summer reading as well as topics for our upcoming discussions and sharing). The two books are:

+ Living Buddha, Living Christ by Thich Nhat Hanh
+ One River, Many wells by Matthew Fox

Have a good summer and enjoy these books....

On September 21, we will begin our new year with Living Buddha, Living Christ by Thich Nhat Hanh.

This is all for now. I do hope you receive this message. Sorry for the delay and confusion... Enjoy a peaceful and safe summer and see you soon...

peace
Fr. Joe, sx

PS: Comments and suggestions are always welcomed!!!
item.name: THE INTERFAITH BOOK CLUB
